text: Shannon McIntosh is an American film producer. She is a recipient of the Golden Globe Award for Best Motion Picture – Musical or Comedy for producing Once Upon a Time in Hollywood. ==Filmography== ===Films=== * Grindhouse (2007) — executive producer * Death Proof (2007) — executive producer * Django Unchained (2012) — executive producer * Angels Sing (2013) — producer * Tusk (2014) — producer * The Hateful Eight (2015) — producer * Meet the Blacks (2016) — producer * Once Upon a Time in Hollywood (2019) — producer * The House Next Door (2019) – producer * Cinderella (2021) – producer ==References== ==External links== * Category:Living people Category:American film producers Category:Golden Globe Award-winning producers Category:Year of birth missing (living people)
title: Shannon McIntosh (filmmaker)
